items.summary: Update ONLY the selected button at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[2]/button[1] (the Landing page “Continue with Internet Identity” button) to use the exact same visual styling as the Weekly Mountain page primary button labeled “View Today's SweetSteps” (same Tailwind class styling for height, typography, rounding, background, hover, and text colors).

Remove the mountain icon from inside ONLY the selected button at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[2]/button[1] so the button content renders as text-only (keep the existing button label/behavior unchanged).
